versions.description: An abandoned urban storefront with dusty windows, peeling paint on the door frame, and faded 'FOR LEASE' sign. The interior is visible through grimy glass—bare concrete floors, exposed pipes, and dim natural light filtering through. The space has good bones but shows years of neglect. Urban architectural details suggest a historic neighborhood with potential.

versions.description: The same storefront completely transformed into an elegant, warmly-lit restaurant. Polished brass door handles, gleaming windows with soft golden light spilling onto the sidewalk. Inside, intimate dining room with warm ochre walls, Edison bulb fixtures casting amber glow, rustic wooden tables packed with diverse diners. Open kitchen visible in background with copper pots hanging. White tablecloths, flickering votives, full house atmosphere with standing guests waiting.

props.name: Grandmother's Restaurant Photo
props.description: A vintage black-and-white photograph in weathered condition, 4x6 inches with rounded corners and sepia tones creeping in from edges. Shows a small, bustling restaurant exterior from the 1960s with hand-painted signage in an Asian script. A proud elderly woman in traditional dress stands in the doorway. The photo has authentic aging—slight creases, fingerprint smudges on glossy surface, and a small tear in one corner that's been carefully mended with yellowed tape on the back.

props.name: Traditional Recipe Book
props.description: A well-worn leather-bound recipe journal with burgundy cover, about 8x10 inches, showing years of kitchen use. Cover has natural patina with oil stains, corner wear exposing underlying material, and a fabric bookmark ribbon faded to pale pink. Pages inside are handwritten in two distinct scripts—older elegant cursive (grandmother's) in faded blue ink, and newer careful notes in black pen with ingredient adjustments and temperature conversions. Some pages have sauce splatters and grease stains that have become part of the book's character.

versions.description: Asian immigrant man, early 60s, with weathered medium-brown skin showing natural aging lines and sun spots. Salt-and-pepper hair, mostly grey, cut short and practical. Deep-set dark brown eyes showing weariness but determination. Slight build, around 5'8", with calloused hands from decades of kitchen work. Wearing worn jeans with faded knees, plain grey t-shirt under an old denim jacket with frayed cuffs, scuffed work boots. Expression carries weight of doubt and financial stress, but underlying resolve. Natural Asian facial features with pronounced laugh lines and furrowed brow from years of concentration.

versions.description: Group of 4 diverse young chefs in their late 20s-early 30s showing dismissive attitudes. DIVERSITY FIRST: Chef 1 - White male with pale peachy skin tone, light brown hair, European features with narrow nose and thin lips. Chef 2 - Black male with deep brown skin tone, African features with broader nose and full lips, short natural hair. Chef 3 - Hispanic male with medium olive-tan skin tone, Latin American features with wider face shape, dark wavy hair. Chef 4 - White female with fair porcelain skin tone, European features, blonde hair in tight bun. All wearing modern chef coats with colorful designer details (one has visible tattoos on forearms). Body language is arrogant—crossed arms, smirking expressions, one pointing dismissively at recipe book. Contemporary trendy appearance with styled hair, several wearing thick-framed glasses, expensive chef knives visible in pockets.

characters.name: Bank Loan Officers
characters.description: Two corporate bank employees in conservative business attire. Officer 1: Middle-aged white male, around 50, with thinning grey hair combed to side, pale skin, wire-rimmed glasses, wearing navy suit with red striped tie, holding manila folder with 'DECLINED' stamp visible. Expression is bureaucratically sympathetic but firm—slight head shake, pursed lips. Officer 2: South Asian female, late 40s, with shoulder-length black hair, medium-brown skin, wearing charcoal grey pantsuit with pearl earrings. Holding tablet showing financial rejection screen. Both sitting behind sterile bank desk with corporate logo visible, fluorescent office lighting creating harsh shadows.

characters.name: Michelin Critics

Refined features with natural aging—subtle lines around eyes, aristocratic bearing. Holding gold-embossed Michelin certificate with reverent two-handed grip. characters.name: Opening Night Diners
characters.description: Diverse crowd of approximately 15-20 restaurant patrons filling intimate dining room. Mixed ages from 30s to 70s, varied ethnicities including White, Black, Hispanic, Asian, and Middle Eastern. Range of upscale-casual attire—some in business casual (blazers, button-downs), others in smart casual (nice sweaters, dresses).
